prompt_text: When the living room lights are turned on after 8 PM, automatically dim them to 40% brightness
automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_after_8pm_dim_40'
alias: Living Room - Dim to 40% After 8 PM
description: "When the Living Room light is turned on after 8 PM, dim it to 40% brightness."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.living_room_2
    from: 'off'
    to: 'on'
conditions:
  - condition: time
    after: '20:00:00'
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 40

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living_room, living
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: off, brighten
Could you clarify: Timing sequence is unclear - should actions happen simultaneously or sequentially?
